test-run.field: ~~Click "Properties" and provide a short description of the software being tested and the test design itself.~~

~~Describe the hi-level goals of this test and pass/fail criteria. \\ \\ By default the Electro-Mechanical Design Verification Test is configured to execute all the active test cases from Electro-Mechanical Test Specification document. You can modify the test planning by adjusting "Select Test Cases" property of a test run template.~~
